Category.title: Exposure of Resource to Wrong Sphere
OWASP Top Ten 2007 Category A6 - Information Leakage and Improper Error Handling

CVE.summary: Unspecified vulnerability in Java Runtime Environment (JRE) for Sun JDK and JRE 6 Update 10 and earlier; JDK and JRE 5.0 Update 16 and earlier; and SDK and JRE 1.4.2_18 and earlier allows untrusted applications and applets to list the contents of the operating user s directory via unknown vectors.
